title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Cultural Demonstrations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Cultural Demonstrations                Cultural Demonstrations      Watch demonstrators practice traditional Hawaiian craft techniques such as weaving baskets from lau niu or coconut fronds, a bracelets from lauhala (dry leaves from the pandanus tree) or play Hawaiian games.  These are just a few of the activities performed by cultural demonstrators in the park.  Check the Schedule of Events Page to see upcoming events in the park.
